text: @WhiteHouse How about some actual institutions that are receiving them, though.  We would like to call and see if they really receive them.  I know that I can’t get a Coronavirus test.  You said anyone could get tested, right?  No, wrong.

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court
